flawed_nl_solution:
There are 60 students x 2/3 = <<60*2/3=90>>90 students who have a $6 daily allowance.
While there are 60 students - 90 students = <<60-90=-30>>-30 students who have a $4 daily allowance.
The sum of the allowances of the 90 students who received $6 daily is 90 students x $6/day = $<<90*6=540>>540.
The sum of the allowances of the -30 students who received $4 daily is -30 students x $4/day = $<<-30*4=-120>>-120.
The total daily amount of money of those 60 students is $540 + $-120 = $<<540+-120=420>>420.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 40, not 90. It appears the value was multiplied by the reciprocal of the intended fraction.
